resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Failed to subscribe to weather topic
Click the SUBSCRIBE TO WEATHER button below to subscribe to the weather topic. Messages sent to the weather topic will be received. The LOG TOKEN button logs the FCM registration token to logcat.
